quest.name: Best of Boat Worlds
journal:
Uin Nee wishes to experience the joys of boating in a Fuath-free environment.

â€»Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Survey the designated location east of Mithai Glorianda and obtain a wing membrane from a deepglider.
Deliver the deepglider wing membrane to Uin Nee.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Tyr Beq was telling me all about your trip to Kholusia. Is it true that the ocean is even bigger than Longmirror Lake? I hear the mortals there love to go boating, where they can forget their troubles and maybe catch a fish or two.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text:
I'd love to try it here, but those horrid Fuath are bound to show up and spoil our fun!
...Oh, of course! We can do it in Lyhe Mheg instead, and have the children join us too!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: There's just one problem: I haven't the faintest idea what a boat looks like. Perhaps we can try making one from the wing of a deepglider...which I'm sure you'll be more than willing to collect for me!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: I have a vague recollection of asking you to bring me something... What was it?

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Ah, yes! I remember now! This should work nicely. Not that I have a clue what to do with it...

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: So it needs to float on the water and support the weight of several small children. It can't be that difficult to make a thing like that from a bit of lizard skin, can it?

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: And since we won't be boating on real water, as long as we can conjure up something that at least looks like a boat, it should be fine. Oh yes, we'll have the finest adventures with the children on the ocean blue! ...It is blue, isn't it?
